products.name: XX99 Mark II
products.about: The new XX99 Mark II headphones is the pinnacle of pristine audio. It redefines your premium headphone experience by reproducing the balanced depth a nd precision of studio-quality sound.

products.name: XX99 Mark I
products.about: As the gold standard for headphones, the classic XX99 Mark I offers detailed and accurate audio reproduction for audiophiles, mixing engineers, and music aficionados alike in studios and on the go.

products.name: XX59
products.about: Enjoy your audio almost anywhere and customize it to your specific tastes with the XX59 headphones. The stylish yet durable versatile wireless headset is a brilliant companion at home or on the move.

products.name: ZX9
products.about: Upgrade your sound system with the all new ZX9 active speaker. It`s a bookshelf speaker system that offers truly wireless connectivity -- creating new possibilities for more pleasing and practical audio setups.

products.name: ZX7
products.about: Stream high quality sound wirelessly with minimal loss. The ZX7 bookshelf speaker uses high-end audiophile components that represents the top of the line powered speakers for home or studio use.

products.name: YX1 wireless
products.about: Tailor your listening experience with bespoke dynamic drivers from the new YX1 Wireless Earphones. Enjoy incredible high-fidelity sound even in noisy environments with its active noise cancellation feature.
